item.title: About me
item.description: Research Interests: Applying the techniques of seismic prospecting to the processing of natural seismic data. Exploring new methods to study the planetary deep interior. Education: Sep.2018 - Now Ph.D.Candiate., Geophysics, School of Geoscience and Engineering, Nanjing University, China Advisor: Tao Wang, Associate professor, Nanjing university Ling Chen, Research professorship, Institue of geology and geophysics, Chinese academy of science Yong Chen, Academicians, Nanjing university Sep.2014 - Jul.
